metadata.name: Desert Kingdom
metadata.description:
Artist: Shaun Stewart

NFT Edition: 1/50

During my travels in Peru, we visited an incredible oasis on the edge of the desert, Huacachina. Driving into town I could see the dunes towering above and realized this wasn't like any desert I had been to before, the scale here was much bigger.

At sunset, I climbed up one of the tallest dunes and was met with this extraordinary view. Sandunes stretch as far as the eye can see, glowing in the golden light. An evening I will never forget.
